name: Peanut Butter Mud Pie
description: Thank you to one of our Epicure consultants for this recipe!

ingredients.name: chopped nuts or seeds, such as peanuts, cashews, walnuts, or almonds

preparation:
1. Preheat oven to 350° F.
  2. Crush cookies into fine pieces and place in a large bowl. Combine with butter. Press cookie mixture into pie plate.
  3. Bake 10 min, until golden. Allow to cool completely.
  4. Meanwhile, in a Multipurpose Pot, whisk mix with coconut milk. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, stirring frequently. Immediately remove from heat. Whisk in yogurt.
  5. In a Prep Bowl, combine nut butter with 1⁄2 cup of mud pie mixture.  
  6. Pour remaining mixture into cooled pie shell; smooth top. Dollop nut butter mixture over top. Using a toothpick or butter knife, swirl to desired look.
  7. Refrigerate until cool. Sprinkle with nuts before serving.
